page.title: 17Charnwood Health and Safety
page.content: The nearest doctors surgery is 2Km SW at Markfield,other GP's are at least 4KM away.Accident cases are taken to a Leicester hospital 14Km S.Police cover is minimal the nearest police station is in Coalville 8Km W.The government of Charnwood can pose quite a problem for the residents as within this area there are 6 Civil Parishes,3 District Councils and 3 Parliamentary Constituencies.Four parishes meet at the Copt Oak crossroads.This can present 4 different policies for the hamlet. Several ecclesiastical parishes cover Charnwood but the one C of E church is at Copt Oak and the parson is shared with Oaks in Charnwood. Times for the one Sunday service vary weekly.This is the only place of worship,Charley Chapel in Charley Road now converted to a house.
